vote.text: Amendment SA 2585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2585 proposed by Senator Isakson for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S13041; text: CR S13041) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2585 proposed by Senator Isakson for Senator Dodd.
